introduction: 他一次又一次地被拒绝，逐渐相信“只有死缠烂打才能统治世界。” 最终，这个固执的孩子会征服他的心吗？Her love rejected over and over, she comes to the belief that "only persistence conquers the world." In the end, will this stubborn child conquer his heart?
